price: Ɛda no a abͻneεfoͻ no kyεw pa ho mma mfasoͻ mma wͻn no; wͻn so na nnomee no wͻ, na wͻn wͻ asetena bͻne paa mu.
arabic: يَوۡمَ لَا يَنفَعُ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ مَعۡذِرَتُهُمۡۖ وَلَهُمُ ٱللَّعۡنَةُ وَلَهُمۡ سُوٓءُ ٱلدَّارِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: yawma lā yanfaʿu al-ẓālimīna maʿdhiratuhum walahumu al-laʿnatu walahum sūu al-dāri
